attributes.action: Block the purchase of GB airways by easyjet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: GB Airways, a franchise of British Airways is to be bought by EasyJet.  This may surely result in the easy jet version of travel being foisted on customers used to GB/BA flights, ie charges for meals, treated like cattle etc.  The government should block this move so that the GB airways and BA partnership continues.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
